txt.en: Minas Glórelloth, the tower of the golden flower, is one of the two watch towers at Ost Galadh.
There are two major, surviving towers in the ruins of Ost Galadh: Minas Celebolf and Minas Glórelloth. From these pinnacles, much of the expanse of Mirkwood may be seen.
Minas Celebolf, the tower of the silver tree, is one of the two watch towers at Ost Galadh.
